name: Beware His Snare
description:
This is just a small project that I'm working on to learn how to program in Unity. This time I wanted to play with lights, sounds, and environmental assets.  The game ends when Harold catches you.

Harold the Duck was an urban legend seen only by children. Harold preys on those who spend most of their time alone and denies the existence of him. Although his apparition may lack sinister gazes, Harold is not a phantom that should be taken lightly.

----------Controls-----------

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look
